languages.text: "Наказание за твое предательство — разжалование. Теперь ты будешь патрулировать нижние уровни Даргонуса. Глейто, так и быть, останется с тобой".
"The punishment for your betrayal is demotion. You will patrol the lower levels of one of Dargonus's hives. Glaito may remain with you."
languages.original_text: "Наказание за твое предательство — разжалование. Теперь ты будешь патрулировать нижние уровни Даргонуса. Глейто, так и быть, останется с тобой".

traits.locale_text: "The punishment for your betrayal is demotion. You will patrol the lower levels of one of Dargonus's hives. Glaito may remain with you."
"The punishment for your betrayal is demotion. You will patrol the lower levels of one of Dargonus's hives. Glaito may remain with you."

"The punishment for your betrayal is demotion. You will patrol the lower levels of one of Dargonus's hives. Glaito may remain with you."

languages.text: "Die Strafe für Euren Verrat lautet Degradierung. Ihr werdet die unteren Ebenen einer der Makropolen von Dargonus patrouillieren. Glaito kann bei Euch bleiben."
languages.original_text: "The punishment for your betrayal is demotion. You will patrol the lower levels of one of Dargonus's hives. Glaito may remain with you."

traits.locale_text: "Die Strafe für Euren Verrat lautet Degradierung. Ihr werdet die unteren Ebenen einer der Makropolen von Dargonus patrouillieren. Glaito kann bei Euch bleiben."

languages.text: « Votre trahison sera punie par une rétrogradation. Vous patrouillerez les niveaux inférieurs de l'une des ruches de Dargonus. Glaito restera avec vous. »
languages.original_text: "The punishment for your betrayal is demotion. You will patrol the lower levels of one of Dargonus's hives. Glaito may remain with you."

traits.locale_text: « Votre trahison sera punie par une rétrogradation. Vous patrouillerez les niveaux inférieurs de l'une des ruches de Dargonus. Glaito restera avec vous. »

languages.text: “你背叛了我，我要降你的职。从今以后，你负责在达戈努斯巢都底层巡逻，格雷托可以留在你身边。”
languages.original_text: "The punishment for your betrayal is demotion. You will patrol the lower levels of one of Dargonus's hives. Glaito may remain with you."

traits.locale_text: “你背叛了我，我要降你的职。从今以后，你负责在达戈努斯巢都底层巡逻，格雷托可以留在你身边。”

languages.text: «El castigo por la traición es la pérdida de rango. Patrullará los niveles inferiores de una de las colmenas de Dargonus. Puede quedarse a Glaito».
languages.original_text: "The punishment for your betrayal is demotion. You will patrol the lower levels of one of Dargonus's hives. Glaito may remain with you."

traits.locale_text: «El castigo por la traición es la pérdida de rango. Patrullará los niveles inferiores de una de las colmenas de Dargonus. Puede quedarse a Glaito».

languages.text: 「裏切りに対する罰は降格だ。君はダルゴナスのハイヴの下層階をパトロールすることになる。グライトは君と一緒に行くがよい」
languages.original_text: "The punishment for your betrayal is demotion. You will patrol the lower levels of one of Dargonus's hives. Glaito may remain with you."

traits.locale_text: 「裏切りに対する罰は降格だ。君はダルゴナスのハイヴの下層階をパトロールすることになる。グライトは君と一緒に行くがよい」

languages.text: "İhanetinin cezası, rütbe indirimi olacak. Dargonus'un bir kovanının alt katlarında devriye gezeceksin. Glaito yanında kalabilir."
languages.original_text: "The punishment for your betrayal is demotion. You will patrol the lower levels of one of Dargonus's hives. Glaito may remain with you."

traits.locale_text: "İhanetinin cezası rütbe indirimi olacak. Dargonus'un bir kovanının alt katlarında devriye gezeceksin. Glaito yanında kalabilir."
